programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she’s often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Curse of the Sarcophagus Ra throws out the instruction manual for his new high-tech Sarcophagus without reading it first. Whiz Kid Ra When Ra secretly uses the all-knowing Answertorium to ace a test, he earns a reputation for having all the answers.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pirate Captain says he doesn't want to be the captain anymore. Noddy investigates how they can help him and he soon finds the reason for the Captain's distress: someone took his beard! Noddy sets out in search of the missing beard.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends… until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family he’s a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she’s often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: The search continues as Puss, Dulcinea, Artephius and Toby must complete task after task to gather the San Lorenzans and defeat the thieves who have a dangerous plan for the

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When the Duchess comes to town declaring that she is ready to start a family, the Orphans have a competition to see who will be the lucky adoptee

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Pawston is celebrating the 40th anniversary of Grandmaw and Grandpaw's Pawtomotive Garage! As a surprise, Tag and Paw decide to track down items to recreate the garage to look like it did when it first opened while the rest of the family distract the Grandpawrents. / Tag and Wind face off in the Lasagna Games for a chance to be Sam’s new Crew Chief. A series of lasagna-themed games will challenge their speed, fix-it skills, and leadership. But there can only be one winner.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling “Adult Babies” before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Curse of the Sarcophagus Ra throws out the instruction manual for his new high-tech Sarcophagus without reading it first. Whiz Kid Ra When Ra secretly uses the all-knowing Answertorium to ace a test, he earns a reputation for having all the answers.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pirate Captain says he doesn't want to be the captain anymore. Noddy investigates how they can help him and he soon finds the reason for the Captain's distress: someone took his beard! Noddy sets out in search of the missing beard.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends… until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.desc: In the tradition of the classic STAR TREK movies, we follow the next generation on its journeys through space and the unknown.

programme.title: Days Of Thunder
programme.desc: A hotshot stock car racer finds more than fame in the south - love for a neurosurgeon who has a marked disdain for racing.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.
A man writing a book about the paranormal travels to New York and stays in a hotel room that has been said to be responsible for the death of all the guests that come to stay.

programme.title: City Of Ember
programme.desc: Ember was built as a refuge for humanity 200 years ago. Now, the great generator that powers the city is failing, and Ember is falling into darkness as the dazzling lights begin to flicker and fade.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator who rose up from his beginnings as a slave races against time in order to rescue his beloved before an erupted volcano destroys the whole city.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is just your average, undercover super-assassin. When he meets Jen, he finds true love. But a picture-perfect marriage will not save Spencer from becoming a target himself. Now Spencer and Jen are on the run for their lives.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahassee, and Wichita embark on a journey to find Little Rock, while dealing with a horde of super-zombies migrating from city to city and destroying everything in their wake.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq 1
programme.desc: As he starts the final part of his journey deep into Iraq, Michael finds a local school in Baghdad and as he did in North Korea talks to the children about life in Iraq and what they hope to do in the future, and how they see the rest of the world. Michael then visits the ancient site of Babylon, a place he used to read about when he was studying the bible at school. He also gets access to enter the massive palace built by Saddam Hussein that overlooks the historic site.

programme.desc: A life story of three friends, one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich, along with their families.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true ‘home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Snow White's Revenge
programme.desc: A mystery romance with a woman who wanted to have the world and a woman who risked everything for revenge.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: ROUND PLAYLIST
programme.desc: The program is intended to promote exchanges between Korea and ASEAN countries by utilizing popular music.

programme.title: Gongbu & Nolbu
programme.desc: Walking in Their Shoes: A Quiz Talk Show for Parents of Elementary School Students. A show that celebrity parents solve their children's problems to find out their everyday experiences and build knowledge together.

programme.title: Pump Up the Healthy Love
programme.desc: A thrilling and humorous “muscle-growth” drama where Do Hyeonjung , the hardcore gym rat and passionate trainer, shakes up the lives of anxious beginners with his bold and unorthodox coaching.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. He had been thoroughly hiding his identity, afraid that he might be an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: The Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Phi, a veteran boxer, sets out on a quest for revenge after the ruthless crime lord Ba Rau killed his wife. His journey takes him into the remote village near Foggy Mountain, where he discovers Ba Rau's human trafficking activities. The final showdown is inevitable as Phi must take down Ba Rau to save the villagers and avenge his wife’s death.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: Babaylan
programme.desc: An immortal woman falls for a dashing young man, without her knowing that his ancestor was her lover in the past. They must work together to escape an insane man who's after her fountain of youth.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Ikaw Pa Rin, Bongga Ka Boy!
programme.desc: Baby is a veterinarian who bumps into a heroic fireman named Boy. Will this lead to a more serious relationship between the two people or will they continue to be unlucky in love?

programme.title: Amnesia Love
programme.desc: A gay guy meets an accident and gets washed up in a remote island. When he wakes up he doesn't remember anything, including his gender orientation. After developing a romance with a barrio lady, things get crazy when his boyfriend is able to locate him.

programme.title: A Hard Day
programme.desc: Dingdong Dantes (Detective Edmund Villon) plays a crooked policeman involved in a hit-and-run accident. John Arcilla (Lieutenant Ace Franco) plays another officer who tries to blackmail him.

programme.title: Instant Daddy
programme.desc: Valentin Roxas (Jerald Napoles) raises a baby left behind in his cab as his own daughter. But his life takes a sharp turn when the birth mother resurfaces.

programme.title: Marita
programme.desc: An actress commits suicide in a theatre full of people. Now she haunts the venue and those who visit.

programme.title: On Vodka, Beers and Regrets
programme.desc: A washed up actress and former child star Jane Pineda (Bela Padilla), battles with love, chances and alcoholism as her career plummets to rock bottom.

programme.title: Upline Downline
programme.desc: A young man struggling to support his family enters the world of multilevel marketing.

programme.title: Torotot
programme.desc: Torotot explores the story of two couples, why and how their marriages crumble and how their infidelity and passions have brought them tragic endings.

programme.title: Mana-Mana Tiba-Tiba
programme.desc: Wilson and Uging, by the virtue of being the first two people who visited the wake of the late Don Segundo became heirs to a two-hundred million fortune.

programme.title: Fangirl Fanboy
programme.desc: It tells the story of a wannabe actor and a talented teleserye dubber who agrees to help him improve his acting. Her coaching helps him achieve his dream of becoming a star only to find herself heartbroken when he becomes successful.

programme.title: Ikaw na Sana
programme.desc: Blanca (Angelu de Leon) is a bubbly young woman with a positive view on life, but on the night she turns eighteen, a curse comes true and and destroys her face and dreams.

programme.title: Cheers S4 E17 - Second Time Around
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 E06 - Fallen Angel
programme.desc: A series of challenging cases take the angels around the world to fight crimes, on behalf of their enigmatic millionaire boss, Charlie.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E06 - Djinn, Djinn Go Home
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 E06 - No Zip In My Zap
programme.desc: Samantha’s coronation as Queen of the Witches launches the Stephens family into another year of supernatural antics as they learn to cope with their young daughter’s developing magical powers.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man, who may just be in town to buy her family's parkland - which is also the location of the annual Christmas celebration

programme.title: North And South Book I E11 - Episode 6 (Part 1)
programme.desc: 1842. Two West Point military academy cadets form a bond of friendship strong enough to survive the forces leading to the United States' Civil War--forces that will rip their country into North and South

programme.title: Cheers S4 E18 - Peterson Principle
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 E07 - Caged Angel
programme.desc: A series of challenging cases take the angels around the world to fight crimes, on behalf of their enigmatic millionaire boss, Charlie.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E07 - The Strongest Man in the World
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 E07 - Birdies, Bogies and Baxter
programme.desc: Samantha’s coronation as Queen of the Witches launches the Stephens family into another year of supernatural antics as they learn to cope with their young daughter’s developing magical powers.

programme.title: CSI S4 E22 - No More Bets
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S2 E11 - Hail to the Chief
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E08 - The Seal Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 E15 - The Triangle
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: ALF S2 E12 - The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate (S9)
programme.desc: Foodies reveal the dishes they've had that are unlike anything else they've ever eaten before.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate (S9)

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship (S13)

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen (S6)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri hosts a burger bonanza! The meaty feast includes grilled shrimp burgers, fried chicken burgers and bison meatloaf burgers.

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen (S6)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri gets sold on some serious salads! There’s Southern Niçoise salad, broccoli date crunch salad and grilled Romaine with spicy prawns.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Terrifying encounters at 40,000 feet. Pilot accounts of UFOs taking control of their aircraft. Entire jumbo jets disappearing into thin air. Pilots have experienced unexplainable events in the sky.

programme.title: All Things Durian
programme.desc: Durian season is an annual celebration in Southeast Asia. From the surprising kampung types to the glamorous clones and the mysterious wild species – nothing beats durian!

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Ancient cultures around the world have aroused fascination and provoked fear with curses and objects used to conjure them, like tablets and stones. But is there proof that some might have actually worked?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is full of deadly predators, and some of them attack in extraordinary and inexplicable ways. Do some animals strike back at humans for reasons beyond normal defence and hunger?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: Confidence grows when irrefutable scientific evidence reports the Fellowship is closer than ever to the gold.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1)
programme.desc: The team searches for the remains of a pirate fleet of ships that vanished suddenly in the Bermuda Triangle, as if swallowed by the ocean. Could a geological anomaly be the source of these whirlpools?

programme.title: All Things Durian
programme.desc: Durian season is an annual celebration in Southeast Asia. From the surprising kampung types to the glamorous clones and the mysterious wild species – nothing beats durian!

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is full of deadly predators, and some of them attack in extraordinary and inexplicable ways. Do some animals strike back at humans for reasons beyond normal defence and hunger?

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: The team dives in search of an A3 Skywarrior attack aircraft that was lost in a suspicious disaster off the USS Saratoga aircraft carrier in 1960. The Saratoga lost eight men on this single mission.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Terrifying encounters at 40,000 feet. Pilot accounts of UFOs taking control of their aircraft. Entire jumbo jets disappearing into thin air. Pilots have experienced unexplainable events in the sky.

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: With the final three participants inching closer to the 50-day finish line, they're forced to adapt their strategies, as they consider the worth of their share from the $500,000 prize pool.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: As the competition continues to drain the survivalists, they soon face a reckoning with the strategies they've implemented. All of them seem to be teetering over the edge.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S11)
programme.desc: In Montana, Tom Oar struggles with heart problems, but refuses to give up his Mountain Man way of life. Jake Herak and Anika Ward have added five new puppies to their pack.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Eustace and his neighbour train a stubborn stallion. Jake and his team of dogs successfully run off their first mountain lion of the season. Aron hunts for moose while Jen fishes for rainbow trout.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The Fellowship is certain that they're closer than ever to an offset chamber when the probe drilling operation in the garden shaft finally gets underway.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: As the garden shaft operation gets deeper, the evidence of gold gets stronger. Willie gets an unexpected boost at the perfect time. Meanwhile, Ronnie and Timmy target a monster terrorising a local marina.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: The team turns their focus back to the mesa and almost immediately gets more evidence of something buried deep within it. And Brandon returns to the ranch with Utah's Attorney General.

programme.title: Biktima
programme.desc: The first time their paths crossed, they are virtual enemies – Becca (Sharon Cuneta) is the relentless prosecutor while Jing (Christopher de Leon) is the jittery accused.

programme.title: Kamagong (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Arnis, the ancient Filipino martial art, took center stage in this coming of age drama wherein a young boy perfected his skills and his idol rediscovered what it takes to be a man.

programme.title: Masamang Damo
programme.desc: When Joko Diaz placed his family in danger after getting into an imbroglio with fellow slumboys, he wisely contrived a plan.

programme.title: Working Boys
programme.desc: The wacky trio of Tito, Vic & Joey became a quartet with the addition of Bagets star, Herbert Bautista. They played jacks-of-all-trades and masters of none in this take-off from the acclaimed Working Girls.

programme.title: Bad Boys Gang
programme.desc: Daang Buenaventura, head of the bad boys gang (and an avid follower of Robin Padilla, hence the similar ways and manner of his everyday lifestyle) prefers living in jail rather than enjoying the free life at the young age of 17.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.title: Takas Sa Impiyerno
programme.desc: Hell is what the residents call their town. It is because Mayor Sebastian (Paquito Diaz) virtually sees the town as his own personal kingdom.

programme.title: Love Notes
programme.desc: The popular radio and TV show for lonely hearts hosted by DJ Joe D'Mango came to the big screen with two stories of young love based on letters from listeners.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: Macho Dancer
programme.desc: Pol came to the big city in search of a better life, but instead, he encountered the harsh reality, which would take more than dreams to survive.

programme.title: Maruja
programme.desc: The classic love story by Mars Ravelo came to life again on the motion picture screen. Maruja, the daughter of a rich landowner and Gabriel, the illegitimate son of a Spanish friar, first fell in love a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Beloved (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Friendship took a violent turn when Nora Aunor found herself a pawn in the intriguing games, being played by her close friend and employer, Hilda Koronel. How far would the bounds of friendship go?

programme.title: Kung Kasalanan Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Irma was the innocent wife, who was caught in a web of evil spunned by the people she loved. Confused, alone and penniless, she had only Mike to turn to. That is if he would believe her.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The Big Robowski
programme.desc: Rob the Robot and his friends, Orbit, Ema, T.K., and Squeak, take adventures across the many amazing planets in the Robot Galaxy in a fantastical world of fun and imagination. Each mission requires the help or involvement of his friends and their unique abilities, be it T.K.’s logical thinking or Ema’s language and early reading knowledge. The adventures, while creative and fun, remain sufficiently rooted in “real life” experiences of preschoolers not only to intrigue and entertain but still make sense. Fun, laughter and learning are just a rocket - hop away!

Whether it’s fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle that’s stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.desc: A woman who killed her husband is disowned by her children in court; a teacher who slept with her teenaged students apologises to the victims' families; and more.

programme.desc: An irate plaintiff storms out of her virtual hearing and is charged with contempt; a quadruple murderer sobs uncontrollably at sentencing; a judge breaks down laughing at a defendant's complaints.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A professor and her long time boyfriend go on a cruise. Shortly after embarking, she is found dead. Authorities deem it an accident, but months later the boyfriend is charged with second-degree murder.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A woman's ex-husband forces himself into her Arkansas home. While skating on a frozen river, a New Hampshire man falls through the ice into freezing water.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A local trip becomes a harrowing ordeal for one family when they're surrounded by an angry mob that attacks their vehicle; a laundromat owner is beaten by unruly patrons from the business next door.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A thief with a knife and a big idea meets a store employee and his bigger blade; a ride share driver has his evening shattered as gunfire rips through his truck.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: an angry defendant starts a courtroom melee; a judge has an unusual punishment for a reckless driver; a grieving mum lashes out; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A judge sends a potty-mouthed defendant to jail; a violent convict shows up for sentencing high on multiple drugs; an angry mom rips into her son's confessed killer; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 73-year-old murder suspect trashes the interrogation room; a married mother of three admits to a 26-year-old cold case killing; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Investigators interrogate a prison inmate about an unsolved serial killer case from the 90s; a former police sergeant is questioned about the murder of his mistress; and more.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S2)
programme.desc: Fauzi is visited by a spirit who claims to be the guardian of the house; a dancer encounters spirits during a performance break, and unintentionally brings back two to her dance group.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S2)
programme.desc: Emzi performs the 'Bloody Mary' ritual at midnight in front of a mirror and experiences true fear; Malaysian actress Tiffany Leong connects to the spirit world even in her youth.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A professor and her long time boyfriend go on a cruise. Shortly after embarking, she is found dead. Authorities deem it an accident, but months later the boyfriend is charged with second-degree murder.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, iba't ibang bahagi ng aklat, diksyunaryo, at elemento ng kuwento. Ipinapakita rin dito ang pagbabasa at pagbabaybay ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach whole numbers up to 10 000, ordinal numbers up to 100th, and money up to PhP1000. These videos also teach addition and subtraction of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes discuss about writing different kinds of sentences, descriptive paragraphs, and diaries. These episodes also show how to use common and proper nouns, plural forms of regular and irregular nouns, and how to read words, phrases, and sentences with short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kinalalagyan ng mga lalawigan sa rehiyong kinabibilangan ayon sa katangiang heograpikal nito.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about ways of sorting materials and describing them as solid, liquid or gas based on observable properties.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pangngalan at mga panghalip. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita, pagtukoy ng mga elemento ng kuwento at pagsagot ng mga tanong tungkol dito.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 100,000. These also teach multiplication and division of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the parts of a paragraph, different resources, and significant details of different text types. These also talk about various ways of identifying the meaning of words.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pagkakakilanlan ng bansa ayon sa mga katangiang heograpikal gamit ang mapa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on grouping different materials based on their properties. These episodes also discuss the changes that materials undergo when exposed to certain conditions.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pangngalan, panghalip, magagalang na pananalita, at mga sanggunian. Pag-uusapan din dito ang pagsagot sa mga tanong, pabibigay ng hinuha, opinyon, solusyon, pagsunod-sunod ng mga pangyayari, at pagsusuri ng maikling pelikula.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the four fundamental operations involving fractions and decimals.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about analyzing images, interpreting the meaning of visual media, and making co ections between information viewed and personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa bahagi ng Pilipinas sa globalisasyon batay sa lokasyon nito sa mundo gamit ang mga kasanayang pangheograpiya at ang ambag ng malayang kaisipan sa pag-usbong ng nasyonalismong Pilipino.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the different types of mixtures and their characteristics and the different techniques to separate mixtures.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri at pagsusulat ng tula, bugtong, sawikain, talata, karunungang-bayan, at pananaliksik.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of factors of polynomials, rational algebraic expressions, linear equations and inequalities in two variables, systems of linear equations and inequalities in two variables and linear functions.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use modals, adverbs, adjectives and nouns. These videos also focus on determining the meaning of words and expressions and citing sources.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa interaksiyon ng tao sa kaniyang kapaligiran na nagbigay-daan sa pag-usbong ng mga sinaunang kabihasnan na nagkaloob ng mga pamanang humubog sa pamumuhay ng kasalukuyang henerasyon.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes are about Newton’s three laws of motion, force, power, and different kinds of energy. These also teach the propagation of sound, properties and characteristics of visible light, heat and temperature, and the effects of heat on the body, and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa mga mitolohiya, parabula, at nobela. Ipinapaliwanag din dito ang wastong paggamit ng pokus ng pandiwa at panghalip, paggamit ng angkop na hudyat sa pagsunud-sunod ng mga pangyayari.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of sequences, polynomials and polynomial equations.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use information from various resources, determine the effect of textual aids, and analyzing materials viewed. These videos also focus on evaluating texts.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sanhi at implikasyon ng mga hamong pangkapaligiran upang maging bahagi ng pagtugon na makapagpapabuti sa pamumuhay ng tao.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episode talk about the relationship among the locations of volcanoes, earthquake epicenters, and mountain ranges.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episode teach about the objects in the environment, its properties or attributes, its similarities and differences. These episodes also talk about letters and body parts and their uses.

programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss whole numbers up to 100, ordinal numbers up to 10th, money up to PhP100.

programme.title: Grade 1 English

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan

programme.title: Grade 2 Math

programme.title: Grade 2 English
